We meet every Friday at 1 PM (Pacific Standard Time).
While our meetings are held in Mountain View, CA, we also have the option of video-conferencing through Google Hangouts or Skype.
Please fill out the volunteering form (at Contact Us -> Join OWB) to join us or to view our current volunteer opportunities or contact us at owb@orphanagewithoutborders.org for requesting information about our organization or share your interests for helping children.
